Attacks.Name: Confusion
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Confused special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psybeam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, apply the Stun special condition to the target character.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: This attack lifts the target character and places them within range 2 of their current position. If a wild is rolled, they also gain the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Teleportation
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character within range 3 of its current position. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Mind Shield
Superpowers.Effect: Add 2 dice to Kadabra's defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Reflect
Attacks.Effect: Reflect an attack back at the attacker. Roll defense dice as usual, and any excess successes (beyond the attack's damage) deal damage back to the attacker.

Superpowers.Name: Psycho Cut
Superpowers.Effect: Make an immediate attack with a strength of 6. If this attack deals damage, gain power equal to the damage dealt. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Alakazam character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
